item.title: Ocean Colour Scene - Up On The Downside
item.description:
This England
made me
Between a war
and a rocket flying
And from the crib
it saves me
And teach me
wrong and right
Then world was
talking
But never got
it’s chance to say
When there’s
too much talking
Nobody hears
a word you say
And you won’t see and
baby now I won’t hear
These blind
communications
Only last throughout
year
And half of
what we’re saying
Is halfway
near the truth
And blind
communication
For a million hearts
and fools-

I am
a witness
To a land of
a million fools
All placing
bets on life
And hate the ones
who lose
And all
who’re lonely
And never get
the chance to say
That their one
and only would be
The chance
to even play
And you won’t see and
baby now I won’t hear
These blind
communications
Only last throughout
the year
And half of
what we’re saying
Is halfway
near the truth
And blind
communication
For a million hearts
and fools-

Hello Monday
the weekends
Just a blur I’ve been
burning bridges
And now I’m begging
at your door
So I’ll keep on
working
‘Cos it’s a chance
for me to pay
For too much
talking
When you believe
the words I say
And you won’t see and
baby now I won’t hear
These blind
communications
Only last throughout
the year
And half of
what we’re saying
Is halfway
near the truth
And blind
communications
For a million hearts
and fools-
